text: The enemy's tower has been destroyed!
We have breached the walls!
The barricades are under attack!
Their settlement is almost a ruin!
Our city has been badly destroyed by the enemy.
The enemy's gates have been destroyed!
Our men have rallied!
We have lost a ship!
Praise the gods! Your victory is moments away!
An entire unit has perished!
The enemy tremble before our superior numbers!
The city lies close to ruin!
We are capturing a victory point!
Our hidden units have been discovered!
One of our ships is being boarded!
The enemy is at the walls!
See! They flee before our might!
Their city has been devastated by the siege!
The battle is turning in our favour!
We have captured the gates!
The battle is no longer in our favour!
The enemy general has sustained a terrible injury, but he will live!
Our general is under attack!
The enemy general is dead!
Our unit has gone berserk!
The enemy approaches!
The men are wavering!
We have seized an enemy victory point!
The ship has replenished its ammunition!
The enemy is about to capture the fort!
Our settlement is burning!
The walls are breached!
Within moments this fort will fall to us!
Our ally has fled! We are abandoned!
A tower has been destroyed!
Their settlement is on fire!
We have lost a victory point!
Our gates are utterly destroyed!
The enemy has reinforcements!
Our general has fallen!
A ship has spent its ammunition!
We should consider a tactical withdrawal!
Our reinforcements have arrived!
All hope is lost!
One of our ships is on fire!
We have discovered the enemy's hidden units!
The waves claim us! Hope has faded!
Look, on the horizon! Reinforcements!
The ocean favours us! Victory is upon us!
One of our units has used all its ammunition!
Our ally's general has sustained a terrible injury, but he will live!
Oars astern! We should withdraw for now!
The enemy's  walls crumble before our might!
The enemy have captured the gates!
Our ally's general has fallen!
We are heavily outnumbered!
Our general has sustained a terrible injury, but he will live!
The enemy have rallied their units!
It's an ambush!
The men are broken and running for their lives!
Black day! Our ally has been routed!
We have destroyed an enemy barricade!
The enemy is attacking our ally!
The enemy has destroyed our siege equipment!
Our men run from the enemy! This is shameful!
The enemy has destroyed a barricade!
